title: RtTSLC: A Framework for Real-Time Two-Handed Sign Language Translation
description: Conceptualized a Framework for Real-Time Two-Handed Sign Language Translation for Indian Sign Language(ISL).
conference: International Conference on Smart Trends in Computing and Communications

title: Sign Language Translation Systems: A Systematic Literature Review
description: Surveyed Literature on Translation Systems by reviewing and summarizing more than 200 research papers and articles.

title: Cardiac anomaly detection models for wearable devices
description: Developed an architecture for a wearable device for classifying 2-lead ECG signal with 98% accuracy.
conference: 13th HiPC Student Research Symposium (SRS),28th IEEE International conference
